# [Interview #231: KOD Signing Report - Tim Kington, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=231#7)

#### Question

Were the Kin inspired by some real-life group?

#### Robert Jordan

No, as far as I know, I made them up.
